content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future, but Loyola Chicago has demonstrated that they are a well-coached and disciplined team that can compete with any opponent. The team's defense is among the best in the country, and they have several talented players who can make clutch shots when needed. However, making a deep run in the tournament depends on a lot of factors, including match-ups, momentum, and luck. So, it remains to be seen how far Loyola Chicago will go in this year's tournament. But they are definitely a team to watch.
